text: The Maverick is a 1952 American western film directed by Thomas Carr and starring Wild Bill Elliott, Myron Healey and Phyllis Coates.Fitzgerald & Magers p.35 ==Cast== * Wild Bill Elliott as Lieutenant Pete Devlin * Myron Healey as Sergeant Frick * Phyllis Coates as Della Watson * Richard Reeves as Frank Bullitt * Terry Frost as Trooper Westman * Rand Brooks as Trooper Barnham * Russell Hicks as Colonel Hook * Robert Bray as Corporal Johnson * Florence Lake as Grandma Watson * Gregg Barton as George Fane * Denver Pyle as Bud Karnes * Robert J. Wilke as Gang leader Massey * Gene Roth as Fred Nixon * Joel Allen as John Rowe ==References== ==Bibliography== * Michael G. Fitzgerald & Boyd Magers. Ladies of the Western: Interviews with Fifty-One More Actresses from the Silent Era to the Television Westerns of the 1950s and 1960s. McFarland, 2006. ==External links== * Category:1952 films Category:1952 Western (genre) films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:Films directed by Thomas Carr Category:Cavalry Western films Category:Allied Artists films Category:Films scored by Raoul Kraushaar
title: The Maverick
